thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Naresh Rane

author: Naresh Rane
title: Naresh Rane
text:
I booked a ticket for my future trip
When the email confirming the reservation was read I noticed a mistake I made I wanted June 14 to 18 instead I selected May 14 to 18
I called the number given and I was pleasantly surprised by calm and reassuring response from other side "not to worry, we will cancel and rebook the ticket for desired dates"
It was nearing midnight on east coast and area code 905 is also in same time zone.
I am so happy to state that good old customer service and a live person on other end is now near extinct fantasy of past still exist with Flight Network
Keep it up
Naresh
